message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique opportunity to get your hands on something truly valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. This is a great deal, considering its worth much more to you than that.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I'm looking to stay within my budget. Would you consider selling it to me for $10000?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're looking to stay within your budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $11500. This is a great compromise that still reflects the value of the product to you.
